subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The comebacks of Barry Zito, left off the Giants’ 2010 postseason roster, and Tim Lincecum, dropped from the 2012 postseason rotation, have provided San Francisco a lift.
snippet: The comebacks of Barry Zito, left off the Giants’ 2010 postseason roster, and Tim Lincecum, dropped from the 2012 postseason rotation, have provided San Francisco a lift.
